item.title: China Turns Legacy Chips Into a Trade Weapon
item.description: As Washington pushes for a TikTok deal, Beijing is countering with probes into American chipmakers.

item.description: As Washington pushes for a TikTok deal, Beijing is countering with probes into American chipmakers.

item.title: Qualcomm teams up with BMW for hands-free driving
item.description: Qualcomm is joining forces with BMW on a new driver-assist system that will allow drivers to take their hands off the wheel on approved roads. Qualcomm, which supplies infotainment, driver-assist, and

item.title: WIRED Roundup: The US Chip Manufacturers’ Bonanza
item.description: On this episode of “Uncanny Valley,” our senior business editor joins us to talk about the Trump administration’s deals with chipmakers, OpenAI’s potential $500 billion valuation—and ants.

item.title: WIRED Roundup: The US Chip Manufacturers’ Bonanza
item.description: On this episode of “Uncanny Valley,” our senior business editor joins us to talk about the Trump administration’s deals with chipmakers, OpenAI’s potential $500 billion valuation—and ants.

item.title: The Trump-Intel Deal Is Official
item.description: The $8.9 billion investment gives the US government a roughly 10 percent equity stake in Intel.

item.title: The Trump-Intel Deal Is Official
item.description: The $8.9 billion investment gives the US government a roughly 10 percent equity stake in Intel.

item.title: Trump Is Betting Big on Intel. Will the Chips Fall His Way?
item.description: The Trump administration is aiming to take an equity stake in Intel, according to US commerce secretary Howard Lutnick. Experts say the unconventional deal could backfire.

item.title: Trump Is Betting Big on Intel. Will the Chips Fall His Way?
item.description: The Trump administration is aiming to take an equity stake in Intel, according to US commerce secretary Howard Lutnick. Experts say the unconventional deal could backfire.

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood
item.description: While everyone else has been talking about Nvidia’s GPUs, Lisa Su has discreetly turned AMD into a chipmaking phenom. And as the US-China tech war rages, she’s at the center of it all.

item.title: Lisa Su Runs AMD—and Is Out for Nvidia’s Blood
item.description: While everyone else has been talking about Nvidia’s GPUs, Lisa Su has discreetly turned AMD into a chipmaking phenom. And as the US-China tech war rages, she’s at the center of it all.

item.title: Trump’s AI Action Plan Is a Crusade Against ‘Bias’—and Regulation
item.description: The Trump administration’s new AI policy blueprint calls for limited regulation and lots of leeway for Big Tech to grow even bigger.
